name: expedia_compare_prices
description: Compare hotel prices on Expedia for a destination. Searches and extracts pricing details from multiple hotels sorted by price for easy comparison, including nightly rate, total cost, and guest rating.

steps.code: const items = []; const hotelEls = document.querySelectorAll('[data-stid="property-listing"], [class*="hotel-card"], [class*="PropertyCard"], [class*="listing-item"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(hotelEls.length, 20); i++) { const el = hotelEls[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('h3, h2, [data-stid="content-hotel-title"]'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[data-stid="content-hotel-price"], [class*="price"] span, [class*="displayPrice"]'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="guest-rating"], [class*="review-score"]'); const starEl = el.querySelector('[class*="star"]'); const reviewCountEl = el.querySelector('[class*="review-count"]'); const neighborhoodEl = el.querySelector('[class*="neighborhood"], [class*="distance"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="Hotel"], a[href*="hotel"]'); const originalPriceEl = el.querySelector('[class*="original-price"], [class*="strikethrough"], s, del'); const discountEl = el.querySelector('[class*="discount"], [class*="savings"]'); const name = nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : ''; if (name) { items.push({ name: name, price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', original_price: originalPriceEl ? originalPriceEl.textContent.trim() : '', discount: discountEl ? discountEl.textContent.trim() : '', star_rating: starEl ? starEl.textContent.trim() : '', guest_rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', review_count: reviewCountEl ? reviewCountEl.textContent.trim() : '', neighborhood: neighborhoodEl ? neighborhoodEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } } const prices = items.map(function(item) { return parseFloat(item.price.replace(/[^0-9.]/g, '')) || 0; }).filter(function(p) { return p > 0; }); const avgPrice = prices.length > 0 ? (prices.reduce(function(a, b) { return a + b; }, 0) / prices.length).toFixed(2) : '0'; const minPrice = prices.length > 0 ? Math.min.apply(null, prices).toFixed(2) : '0'; const maxPrice = prices.length > 0 ? Math.max.apply(null, prices).toFixed(2) : '0'; return { destination: `{{destination}}`, checkin: `{{checkin}}`, checkout: `{{checkout}}`, hotel_count: items.length, price_summary: { average: avgPrice, lowest: minPrice, highest: maxPrice }, hotels: items }
steps.name: comparison_data
steps.label: Extract and compare prices
